title: AWS Cloud Infrastructure Bundle
description: Complete AWS infrastructure management toolkit combining cloud architecture expertise, CloudFormation validation, and AWS services integration. Perfect for teams building and maintaining cloud-native applications on AWS.
author: JSONbored

items.reason: Expert guidance for AWS architecture and design patterns
DevOps and SRE best practices for cloud operations
Direct integration with AWS services and APIs
Designs scalable backend architectures for cloud deployment

prerequisites: Basic understanding of cloud computing concepts

troubleshooting.issue: AWS MCP server fails: 'Credentials not configured' error
troubleshooting.solution: Run aws configure to set credentials. Ensure AWS_REGION, AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY are in environment or ~/.aws/credentials file.

troubleshooting.issue: CloudFormation validator conflicts with AWS services MCP
troubleshooting.solution: Install validator hook after AWS MCP server. Update config order: MCP servers first, then hooks. Restart to reinitialize hook dependency chain.

troubleshooting.issue: Backend architect agent and AWS rules give contradictory advice
troubleshooting.solution: Prioritize AWS cloud architect rule for AWS-specific patterns. Use backend architect for general design. Set rule precedence in config hierarchy.

troubleshooting.issue: AWS CLI version 1.x incompatible with MCP server features
troubleshooting.solution: Upgrade to AWS CLI v2: curl https://awscli.amazonaws.com/install | bash. Verify with aws --version. MCP server requires CLI v2.0+ for SSO support.

troubleshooting.issue: Permission errors when validator checks CloudFormation templates
troubleshooting.solution: Grant IAM permissions: cloudformation:ValidateTemplate and cloudformation:DescribeStacks. Add to AWS user/role policy, then restart validator hook.
